attributes.review: Downloaded the app and logged in. I was just about to explore it when suddenly my phone rings and it was my credit fraud company telling me that all my money was stolen. I got a call about two weeks later saying that my identity had been stolen. I was starting to think that this might be a result of the app, but then something horrible happened. A man wearing nothing but the American flag draped around his body came to my house and stole my dog. Don‚Äôt trust this app.
attributes.title: Stole My Information

I can barely type this review right now because of the glitching from this app. I was just trying to download it to get news and updates on my amazing, wonderful president. Too bad this app is dangerous!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD! you would think this app would be safe since it‚Äôs for the president. get it together!

attributes.title: BUG APP DESIGNED BY RUSSIANS

attributes.review: The app makes you sign up with your phone number and I got text messages every hour, very clingy. Promoted mostly merch, shoving it down your throat. Also continued to only talk badly on democrats, a candidate shouldn't be obsessively talking so poorly of the other side to prove they are better but encourage their viewer of why they are great, very scapegoat. I dont feel like hearing such negativity. #OVERIT App was a waste. Most of the information I back checked and it was false.
attributes.title: Wish I could give it 0 stars üò°

attributes.title: DONT DOWLOAD THIS APP!

attributes.review:
To all of you who have voted for Trump and realize all that he has done for this country... what is wrong with you.

Are you aware that you support a man who is racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, delusional, arrogant, toxic, and just overall a terrible person.

We elected somebody who removed health coverage for transgender people, put immigrants into cells and separated them from their families, and has put many people out of work.

Now, when it comes to the end of his term, he is getting defensive. He is taking his anger out on protestors and the youth who is trying to make America a better place. He wants to shut down popular apps like TikTok to ‚Äúpunish‚Äù China, and he is actively making every bodies lives a living hell.

He deserves nothing. He deserves no platform.
attributes.title: America is not in favor of Trump

I tried several times to delete the app but every time it would pop back up on my home screen. I thought I couldn‚Äôt get any worse but then I started getting email, texts and even calls telling me that if I don‚Äôt vote for trump, they threatened to hurt me or find my friends and family.. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!! Please stay safe
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL

attributes.review: i‚Äôll start off by saying this app took 213 days to install. once it was installed, i got a message from an unknown number. the message briefly told me that they now have all of my information and if i didn‚Äôt vote for trump they would sell it on the black market. i no longer feel safe in my own home. this app has made me feel as if my bones were disintegrating inside me. my organs eviscerating into plain nothingness. my soul slowly slipping away into a black endless hole called ‚Äúamerica‚Äù. i feel violated, attacked, abused, assaulted, oppressed, suppressed, depressed and threatened.  i am now lying here, on my bathroom floor, crying, with no soul. i don‚Äôt know how i will ever go on. thanks donald j trump for murdering me. i am embarrassed to have a murderer for a president. but hey, this is america.
attributes.title: my life seems to be over

attributes.review: Most basic and narcissistic app to ever exist. I proceeded to give the app another chance and was bombarded with all these things trying to have me sign my life away... could you not was on the toilet for the rest of the week trying to recover from my experience. I highly recommend that you do not download this app. Thank me later .
